医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现男性患糖尿病并发症的风险高于女性《流行病学与社区健康杂志》在线发表的一项长期研究表明，男性比女性更容易受到糖尿病（1 型和 2 型）对健康的主要影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Men-face-higher-risk-of-diabetes-complications-than-women-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Men-face-higher-risk-of-diabetes-complications-than-women-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03ca69e9-f857-4bdf-bac4-a4679d9432e2 Thu, 16 May 2024 22:21:48 -0400 Men face higher risk of diabetes complications than women, study finds
南加州大学研究人员获得 310 万美元用于研究糖尿病母亲所生婴儿的早期大脑发育人们早就知道，患有糖尿病的孕妇比怀孕期间没有患糖尿病的女性更有可能生出肥胖的孩子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/USC-researcher-receives-2431M-to-study-early-brain-development-in-babies-born-to-diabetic-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/USC-researcher-receives-2431M-to-study-early-brain-development-in-babies-born-to-diabetic-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14889d7a-8525-477b-b3fb-7dad38b160e6 Thu, 16 May 2024 22:14:40 -0400 USC researcher receives $3.1M to study early brain development in babies born to diabetic mothers
提供筛查选项可提高结直肠癌检测率根据美国癌症研究所领导的一项新研究，当患者可以选择自己想要的筛查类型（带回家的工具包或结肠镜检查）时，与仅接受结肠镜检查的患者相比，结直肠癌筛查率增加了一倍多宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Offering-screening-options-boosts-colorectal-cancer-test-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Offering-screening-options-boosts-colorectal-cancer-test-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08483e0d-c93f-45ca-989f-d7a40cf1483b Thu, 16 May 2024 22:07:37 -0400 Offering screening options boosts colorectal cancer test rates
研究发现，带有经济奖励的短信可以促进肥胖男性减肥研究发现，将行为短信与经济激励相结合可以促进肥胖男性显着减肥，而单独短信则不能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Text-messages-with-financial-rewards-boost-weight-loss-in-obese-men-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Text-messages-with-financial-rewards-boost-weight-loss-in-obese-men-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b685df65-46c9-4888-95f1-888fe4263bfc Thu, 16 May 2024 21:33:00 -0400 Text messages with financial rewards boost weight loss in obese men, study finds
研究发现基因和年龄揭示了认知变异的新见解研究检查了特定基因和年龄对认知的影响，揭示了为未来研究创建基因型和认知分层队列的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Genes-and-age-reveal-new-insights-into-cognitive-variability-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Genes-and-age-reveal-new-insights-into-cognitive-variability-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcca6f1b-9f56-45d4-a7cc-0b8175af9766 Thu, 16 May 2024 21:24:00 -0400 Genes and age reveal new insights into cognitive variability, study finds
研究发现华盛顿猎犬表现出 H5N1 禽流感病毒抗体研究发现华盛顿州 2% 的猎犬体内存在 H5 和 N1 亚型甲型流感病毒抗体，这表明水禽可能会传染给狗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Hunting-dogs-in-Washington-show-antibodies-to-H5N1-bird-flu-virus-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Hunting-dogs-in-Washington-show-antibodies-to-H5N1-bird-flu-virus-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=374f7e09-3a92-4a6c-89e3-76d13b392e6c Thu, 16 May 2024 19:57:00 -0400 Hunting dogs in Washington show antibodies to H5N1 bird flu virus, study finds
围手术期免疫治疗可改善可切除 NSCLC 患者的无事件生存期研究人员表示，与单独的术前（新辅助）化疗相比，在手术前后添加围手术期免疫治疗可显着改善可切除早期非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者的无事件生存期（EFS）来自德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Perioperative-immunotherapy-significantly-improves-event-free-survival-in-患者-with-resectable-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Perioperative-immunotherapy-significantly-improves-event-free-survival-in-患者-with-resectable-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c85ebfbb-c849-4b79-82b4-bc8c8b9127dd Thu, 16 May 2024 16:19:00 -0400 Perioperative immunotherapy improves event-free survival in patients with resectable NSCLC
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：禽流感成为下一个公共卫生挑战自从一种禽流感病毒传播到至少九个州的奶牛和至少一名奶牛场工人以来，公共卫生官员正在密切关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Bird-flu-lands-as-the-next-public-health-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Bird-flu-lands-as-the-next-public-health-challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38220501-6c4f-495e-9522-3beafdface21 Thu, 16 May 2024 16:09:00 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Bird flu lands as the next public health challenge
减肥手术可降低患有高胰岛素血症的肥胖女性患乳腺癌的风险减肥手术与肥胖女性患乳腺癌的风险降低有关。这些是哥德堡大学进行的一项研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Bariatric-surgery-linked-to-reduced-breast-cancer-risk-in-obese-women-with-hyperinsulinemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Bariatric-surgery-linked-to-reduced-breast-cancer-risk-in-obese-women-with-hyperinsulinemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c086158d-dbdd-4472-97aa-00605e485d6e Thu, 16 May 2024 16:07:48 -0400 Bariatric surgery linked to reduced breast cancer risk in obese women with hyperinsulinemia
研究表明发育多巴胺信号传导中断与 ASD 之间存在联系最近的证据表明多巴胺在神经发育中起着至关重要的作用。在一项新的研究中，研究人员证明了发育多巴胺信号传导中断与自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Study-demonstrates-link- Between-disrupted-developmental-dopamine-signaling-and-ASD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Study-demonstrates-link- Between-disrupted-developmental-dopamine-signaling-and-ASD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b44e243-2eb8-443e-871f-b885fb53f373 Thu, 16 May 2024 16:01:50 -0400 Study demonstrates link between disrupted developmental dopamine signaling and ASD
